mapper.select: SELECT comment_id, board_id, user_id, content, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, update_id, update_date FROM r_blog_comment WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO r_blog_comment (board_id, user_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE r_blog_comment SET content = #{content}, update_id = #{updateId}, update_date = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
